column4: im trying to hook up my laptop to an external monitor and im having some difficulty finding how to configure my laptop to do this. can anyone help??
You connected it, then what is happening?
Do you see it in the «Monitor» utlity?
Are you sure it is connected properly?
yes it is. i was having some trouble with it before when i was running windows, but is there any kind of control panel where i can configure my laptop to run through my external monitor?
said that i didnt have the right drivers
What exactly do it say? Quote, please.
It appears that your graphics driver does not support the necessary extensions to use this tool.  Do you want to use your graphics driver vendor's tool instead?
And what is the problem in configuring it in the Nvidia card utility?
What's in the «X Server Display Configuration» tab?
i see the monitor that i am hooked up to: the samsung syncmaster
i just hit configure, and it gives me the option to twin view, and do a seperate screen
hmm thats weird, i just did twin view, and nothing popped up on my samsung
Is resolution for that monitor set properly?
